# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not in a NO_FUEL state.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_INGREDIENTS state.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to a power network before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of steam engines to ensure they are not in a NOT_CONNECTED state.

### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of electricity groups to ensure they are not in a NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK state.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of pipe groups to ensure they are not in an EMPTY state.

### Errors when using belt groups without items
- Ensure that belt groups have a sufficient item supply before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of belt groups to ensure they are not in an EMPTY state.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs. 
Important variables that have been assigned include:
* Entity positions (e.g. x=41.0 y=-82.0)
* Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL)
* Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace)
